node.title: Ghislaine Maxwell is on trial on sex abuse charges. Here's what it was like inside the courtroom
node.alt: A court sketch shows Ghislaine Maxwell, a brunette woman wearing a disposable face mask, sitting in a court room
node.description: The first day in Ghislaine Maxwell's sex abuse trial sets the stage for an argument over whether she was a predator and "partner in crime" or a scapegoat taken advantage of by deceased financier Jeffrey Epstein.
node.content:
["The line outside the New York court where Ghislaine Maxwell's long-awaited trial began on Monday formed well before dawn.\u00a0", "Ms Maxwell, 59, is accused of recruiting and grooming four young girls for her ex-partner Jeffrey Epstein to sexually abuse between 1994 and 2004. She has strenuously denied those charges.\u00a0", "The Oxford-educated daughter of British newspaper magnate Robert Maxwell has been in jail in Brooklyn since her arrest in July 2020.\u00a0", "Her trial is taking place in downtown Manhattan, close to the jail where Epstein died by suicide two years ago.\u00a0", "Members of the public \u2014 including supporters of the former socialite and her alleged victims \u2014 huddled in near-freezing temperatures alongside the media, hoping to secure a seat in the grand Thurgood Marshall courthouse.\u00a0", "", "
Members of the public were queueing up outside the courtroom from 6am.(Reuters:\u00a0Carlo Allegri)
", "As the cold started to bite, a \"professional line sitter\" handed out his business card, in case anyone didn't fancy the long wait the next day.\u00a0", "\"We wait for your wants!\", it read.\u00a0", "Among the crowd was Sarah Ransome, a South African woman who has a book coming out about her experiences with Epstein, whom she met in 2006 when she was 22.\u00a0", "Ms Ransome told reporters outside the court she had barely slept the night before the trial.", "\"I am just here for the girls,\" she said, referring to the four alleged victims.\u00a0", "\"I'm here to support them. Strength in numbers.\"\u00a0", "", "
Sarah Ransome, an alleged victim of Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell, told reporters she wanted to be in court to support those who accused Ms Maxwell of recruiting and grooming them.\u00a0(AP: John Minchillo)
", "Christopher Mason, a friend of Ms Maxwell's, expressed sympathy for the accused.\u00a0", "\"Can you imagine being at the centre of all this?\" he said.\u00a0", "\"It must be the latest horror.\"\u00a0", "
Crowds jostle for a seat to watch drawn-out jury selection\u00a0
", "Inside, there was more waiting as the painstakingly slow wheels of court bureaucracy turned.\u00a0", "First, there was the security check, an operation so understaffed it made getting through London Heathrow appear straightforward.\u00a0", "Then, all electronics had to be tagged and handed in.\u00a0", "Most of those who had secured a seat were escorted to one of the overflow courtrooms, where proceedings were being transmitted on a tiny screen.\u00a0", "Reporters crowded around asking, \"Is that her?\", as they pointed at a minuscule image they believed was Ms Maxwell.\u00a0", "\"Guys, you can't stand there,\" one of the court marshals said.\u00a0", "\"I know it's ridiculously small. I'm trying to get it fixed.\"\u00a0", "One of Epstein's accusers, who had travelled from the UK to witness the trial, exclaimed: \"Are you kidding me? I should just have stayed home and watched telly.\"\u00a0", "Cameras are banned from the federal trial.\u00a0", "The drawn-out morning session was taken up with finalising and swearing-in the jury.\u00a0", "\"The current status is that we are missing three jurors,\"\u00a0Judge Alison Nathan told the courtroom.", "One had apparently forgotten they should turn up for one of the most highly anticipated court cases of the year; two could not be located.", "And the troubles didn't end there.\u00a0", "The spouse of one of those selected for the final group of 12 jurors and six alternates had booked a surprise Christmas trip, which would take the couple out of town on sitting days.\u00a0", "Another said their employer would only grant them two weeks' jury leave \u2014\u00a0the trial is expected to last six.", "The defence would not let them go that easily and asked the judge to phone the potential juror's employer, asking them to reconsider.", "Judge Nathan made the call and human resources was considering the matter, she reported back.\u00a0", "A 10-minute deadline eventually stretched to an hour.\u00a0", "
Ghislaine Maxwell enters the courtroom
", "Ms\u00a0Maxwell was escorted into the court\u00a0in her\u00a0civilian attire.\u00a0", "", "
Ghislaine Maxwell wore a mask in court and was seen taking notes during the opening statements.\u00a0(AP:\u00a0Elizabeth Williams)
", "In the run-up to the trial, Ms Maxwell's defence team complained about conditions at the Brooklyn detention centre where Ms Maxwell\u00a0has been held since her arrest in July last year, saying her health was suffering.\u00a0", "In court, Ms Maxwell\u00a0appeared active and alert.\u00a0", "She frequently leaned over to speak to members of her defence team and scribbled several notes during the prosecution's opening arguments.\u00a0", "Her sister, Isabel, who was seated in the front row, was also taking notes.\u00a0", "Ms Maxwell's brother, Ian, has said a family member would\u00a0support her each day, despite seats in the actual courtroom being in short supply.\u00a0", "", "
Ghislaine Maxwell's sister Isabel was in court on the first day.(Reuters: Eduardo Munoz)
", "The courtroom is spaced out due to COVID-19 and masks are mandatory, except within two specially constructed plexiglass boxes.", "Prosecution and defence lawyers are allowed to remove their facial coverings when they go into the box to make their statements.\u00a0", "Witnesses will also testify from within a plexiglass box.\u00a0", "
Opening statements begin with 'a young girl named Jane' setting the scene
", "Once the jury was finally sworn-in, around 1pm local time, opening statements began, with the prosecution and defence putting forward two versions of the trial that lays ahead.", "The prosecution described Ms Maxwell as a predator and partner-in-crime, while her defence argued she was used as a powerful man's pawn.\u00a0", "\"I want to tell you the story of a young girl named Jane,\" lead prosecutor and assistant US attorney Lara Pomerantz said.\u00a0", "Ms Pomerantz described \"Jane\" being introduced to a man and woman at a school camp, where the man claimed he was a donor.\u00a0", "\"What Jane didn't know then is that man and woman were predators,\" she said.\u00a0", "\"Who was that woman targeting young girls for sexual abuse? It was the defendant: Ghislaine Maxwell.\"\u00a0", "", "
Ghislaine Maxwell is on trial for recruiting and grooming four young girls for Jeffrey Epstein to abuse.(Supplied)
", "Jane is the name that will be used to anonymise three of the four women at the centre of the case against Maxwell \u2014 only one, Annie Farmer, has waived her right to anonymity.", "The defence sought to distance Ms Maxwell from Epstein, arguing she had been used as a \"scapegoat\".\u00a0", "\"Ever since Eve was accused of tempting Adam with the apple, women have been blamed for the bad behaviour of men,\" Ms Maxwell's lawyer Bobbi Sternheim told the court.\u00a0", "
The first witness takes to the stand
", "The first prosecution witness in the case was Lawrence Paul Visoski Jr, who worked as a pilot for Epstein.\u00a0", "Mr Visoski flew the private jets that shuttled Epstein, Ms Maxwell and others between his various homes during the 1990s and 2000s.\u00a0", "", "
Lawrence Paul Visoski Jr, who was one of Jeffrey Epstein's pilots, was the first witness to take the stand.(AP: Elizabeth Williams)
", "He was asked about the layout of his former boss's New York residence, which he regularly visited to pick up luggage and do chores.", "He was also described Ms Maxwell and Epstein's relationship as \"couple-ish\", though not necessarily romantic.", "\"It was more personal than business,\" he said.\u00a0", "Proceedings ended promptly at 5pm, with Mr Visoski due to return to the stand tomorrow.\u00a0", "The trial is scheduled to continue for six weeks, with the four alleged victims, their family members, and friends and family of Epstein set to testify.\u00a0", "Ms Maxwell faces up to 80 years in prison if convicted on all accounts. \u00a0"]
